## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life!

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

> Word count: `r wordcountaddin::word_count()`

```{r}
contribution_data <- select(contributions, transaction_type, transaction_amt, cand_id)
house_election_data <- select(house_elections, fec_id, party, ge_winner)
```
